name: Qumva Network
description: Qumva Network aims to create a decentralized social media platform powered by Web3.This innovative Qumva Network seeks to revolutionize the way people interact and engage online by providing a secure, transparent, and user-centric social networking experience.Qumva Network aims to create a decentralized social media platform powered by Web3.This innovative Qumva Network seeks to revolutionize the way people interact and engage online by providing a secure, transparent, and user-centric social networking experience
